name: MechaBusters
description:
BUILD YOUR MECH

BUST THE COMPETITION

WIN THE TOURNAMENT

MechaBusters is a mech building and combat game. Play across 4 levels as you rise through the ranks to take on increasingly difficult enemies who seek to stop your rise to the top.

Will you win the tournament?

Or get BUSTED like the rest?

MECHABUSTERS

Controls

W/A/S/D - controls your mech and the camera when building your mech. 

Shift - dash and avoid enemy attacks

Scroll wheel - change your zoom at any time! (Works on build screen too!)

Mouse to aim, or use auto-aim in the settings.
